          <title>
            <string language="en">The presence of carbon in natural water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Vorhandensein des Carbons im natürlichen 
Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La présence du carbone dans l'eau normale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A presença do carbono na água natural</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La presenza di carbonio in acqua naturale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η παρουσία άνθρακα στο φυσικό ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La presencia del carbón en agua natural</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the different species of carbon present in natural water at various pH.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die unterschiedliche Sorte 
des Carbons vorhanden im natürlichen Wasser bei verschiedenem pH.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les différentes 
espèces du carbone actuelles dans l'eau normale au divers pH.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a espécie diferente do 
carbono atual na água natural no vário pH.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la specie differente

          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la diversa especie del
